# this is the build file for project Szar
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(Szar VERSION 1.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(Game "")
set_target_properties(Game PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Game")
set_target_properties(Game PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
add_dependencies(Game Szar)
target_include_directories(Game PRIVATE
    Szar/include
)
target_include_directories(Game INTERFACE
    Szar/include
)
target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(Game PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(Game PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(Game PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET Game PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(Game PRIVATE
    Szar
)
target_link_directories(Game PRIVATE
    build/windows/x64/release
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target Game
target_sources(Game PRIVATE 
    Game/src/main.cpp
)
# private headers for target Game
target_sources(Game PRIVATE FILE_SET HEADERS FILES
    Game/src/test.hpp
)

# target
add_library(Szar SHARED "")
set_target_properties(Szar PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Szar")
set_target_properties(Szar PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
set_target_properties(Szar PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(Szar PRIVATE
    Szar/include
)
target_include_directories(Szar INTERFACE
    Szar/include
)
target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(Szar PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(Szar PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(Szar PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET Szar PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target Szar
target_sources(Szar PRIVATE 
    Szar/src/Szar.cpp
)
